Frankfurt a.M., Germany

Casino Building, Campus Westend, Goethe University Frankfurt

Nina-Rubinstein-Weg 1, D-60323 Frankfurt am Main

Access to the Venue

By Public Transportation

  • From the Airport: Take the S-Bahn S8 or S9 (direction Hanau) to "Hauptwache" or "Central Station".
  • From the Central Railway Station (Hauptbahnhof): Take bus line 64 (direction Ginnheim) to stop "Bremer Straße".
  • Alternative via Subway: Take any S-Bahn to "Hauptwache" or subway U4/U5 to "Willy-Brandt Platz", then take U1, U2, U3, or U8 (direction Ginnheim/Heddernheim/Riedberg/Bad Homburg/Oberursel) to stop "Holzhausenstraße". From there, it is a 5-minute walk.
  • From Konstablerwache: Take bus line 36 (direction Westbahnhof) to stop "Uni Campus Westend".

By Car

Drive toward "Frankfurt Stadtmitte" and follow the signs to the "Miquelallee".

  • Turn right into "Hansaallee" at the first traffic light.
  • Leave the "Hansaallee" at the second traffic light and turn right onto "Bremer Straße".
  • Turn right at the next traffic light into "Fürstenberger Straße".

Note: Parking around the campus is difficult; we highly recommend using public transport.

Hotels

The following hotels are located near the venue:

  • Hotel Liebig*** (Privathotel): Liebigstr. 45, 60323 Frankfurt | +49 69 24 18 29 90 | www.hotelliebig.de
  • Hotel Palmenhof**** (Hotel Garni): Bockenheimer Landstraße 89-91, 60325 Frankfurt | +49 69 75 30 060 | www.hotelpalmenhof.de
  • Turm Hotel GmbH***: Eschersheimer Landstr. 20, 60322 Frankfurt | +49 69 15 40 50 | www.turmhotel-fra.de
